original_text: To confirm these days of Purim in their times appointed, according as Mordecai the Jew and Esther the queen had enjoined them, and as they had decreed for themselves and for their seed, the matters of the fastings and their cry.
korean_text: 정한 기간에 이 부림일을 지키게 하였으니 이는 유다인 모르드개와 왕후 에스더가 명령한 바와 유다인이 금식하며 부르짖은 것으로 말미암아 자기와 자기 자손을 위하여 정한 바가 있음이더라

sentences.original_text: To confirm these days of Purim in their times appointed
sentences.korean_translation: 이 정해진 때에 부림의 날들을 확인하려고

sentences.original_text: according as Mordecai the Jew and Esther the queen had enjoined them
sentences.korean_translation: 유다인 모르드개와 에스더 왕후가 그들에게 명한 대로

sentences.original_text: and as they had decreed for themselves and for their seed
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 자신들과 그들의 후손을 위해 규정한 대로

sentences.original_text: the matters of the fastings and their cry
